name: Geminis Great Adventure
description:
This game has been made for the Easter Hunt Game Jam.

You are Gemini, a wizard. You have to collect all magical books without getting catched by a flying beast which is hunting you.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys for movement
Space or Shift for the dashing ability

Lore:

Long ago a great and handsome wizard was cursed by a rock beast to forever have a gem stuck to his face. The gem gives him great power, but hides his beautiful face and is very tiring. The people of the land call him Gemini. The purple wizard finds out that in an ancient forest, lurks hidden books that have the clues to free him from his curse. But a long-forgotten eye-beast lurks. It guards these books with unbroken Determination.
